nodes.text: Soo Rcharrz was a member of the "Rebel Four," an elite task force of Rebel Alliance members.

While assaulting a group of stormtroopers in an Imperial base on the planet Vatleria, Soo and her teammates fell into traps set by Darth Vader. Soo was executed by being disintegrated into nothingness.

Soo Rcharrz, like the rest of the Rebel Four, is a parody of a member of the comic book heroes the Fantastic Four. Her death by disappearing into nothing is a reference to Sue Richards, the Invisible Woman, as is her name.
